TopicTitle: [Kopernicus] The Kirius System - Kirius is back! (Well, it will be soon, anyway!)

Articles.Content:
Nvm, gonna work on another project.

Please lock.

Edited September 12, 2015 by _Augustus_
Looks really cool! But will it be placed far enough from Kerbol to not conflict with OPM and/or Trans-Keptunian?

Looks really cool! But will it be placed far enough from Kerbol to not conflict with OPM and/or Trans-Keptunian?
Yeah. And you can always get KerbalGalaxy.

I have been asked to update CKAN's planet pack section and saw that your previous version of this pack was added to CKAN. Do I need to update the file, or do you want me to wait 'till you make a new release?
